title: NYS Governor Cuomo Email received from Kevin Riford, Peter Vito U.S. Marshal Withdraw & Attorney Steven Cohen

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.) copy of the May 1, 2019 email sent from Kevin Riford to NYS Governor Cuomo. I've attached a redacted copy of the email.
2.) copy of any and all records regarding the Buffalo News article by Jerry Zremski, After Veto, Vito Pulls U.S. Marshal Nomination, Buffalo News (Sept. 11, 2019) https://buffalonews.com/news/local/article_a49a6945-3128-509d-b82e-e164fad1927f.html. I've attached a copy as well.
4.) copy of any and all records regarding the Buffalo News article Dan Herbeck, ‘Gerace Attorney 1’ Under Investigation by Feds in Pharaoh’s Strip Club Case, Buffalo News (Jan. 15, 2024), https://buffalonews.com/news/local/crime-courts/article_8878fc02-b1ae-11ee-9ea5-53c3dc43d79b.html

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am filing a request to request sight of the Ohio law that allows an inmate in an Ohio institution, who has been treated for "heat exhaustion with four bags of I.V fluid” in a prison infirmary. And  is then returned to the same segregation housing,  without ventilation or fans, that caused them to have heat exhaustion?

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Supergirl12
